department: Travaux publics et Services gouvernementaux Canada
description:
Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Tendering Procedures: If 2+ bidders make a bid that contains only Canadian goods / services, other bids will not be considered
Competitive Procurement Strategy: Loweest / Lower Bid
Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No
Nature of Requirements: 

RISO Coffee Products

W0105-23F004/A
MacFarlane (MCT), Andrew
Telephone No. - (782) 377-4248
Fax No. - (506) 851-6759

IMPORTANT NOTICE TO SUPPLIERS RE. BID SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS

Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 Pandemic and limited staff available at the Moncton, NB bid receiving unit, bidders are encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service or facsimile instead of any of the other methods of bid delivery that are available for this bid solicitation. 

If you must hand-deliver your bid (yourself or via courier), the on-site bid drop box must be used. 

Please follow the instructions on the bid box itself.

The requirement is subject to the provisions of CETA and has a preference for Canadian Goods.

REQUREMENT:

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence has a requirement for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply and delivery of Coffee Products and provide a Liquid Coffee Dispensing Machine with Maintenance Services and to all DND owned coffee brewing /dispensing machines and equipment also. This requirement is to be provided to Department of National Defence at the 5th Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown located in Oromocto New Brunswick E2V 4J5 on an as and when requested basis for the period from October 1st 2022 to September 30th 2023, inclusive.

INSTRUCTIONS TO OFFERORS:

Suppliers must provide a price for all items at Annex B. 
All items MUST be available for initial set-up.

Only one (1) Standing Offer will be awarded to the lowest aggregate bid, total extended cost of all items, meeting all mandatory requirements. 
The supplier MUST be compliant with Annex A and Annex B.

Estimated quantities are based on a one 
(1) year period.

GSIN: N8955ZA Coffee

Delivery Date: Above-mentioned

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

full_summary:
### Government Notice for RISO Coffee Products

#### RFP Number and Name
* **RFP Number/référenceNFP**: W0105-23F004/A
* **RFP Name/nomFPA**: RISO Coffee Products

#### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category/catégorieDe Marché**: Goods and Services provided by Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Trade Agreement/accordDe Commerce**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Method/methodeDe Marché**: Competitive selection with selective tendering

#### Product Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier who can provide Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISO) for the supply and delivery of Coffee Products, including a liquid coffee dispensing machine with maintenance services. Deliveries will be made to the 5th Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown, located in Oromocto, New Brunswick, E2V 4J5.

#### Estimated Order Quantities
The required supplies will be delivered on an as-and-when-requested basis over a one-year period from October 1st, 2022 to September 30th, 2023.

#### Mandatory Requirements
* The supplier must provide prices for all items listed in Annex B.
* The supplier must comply with the mandatory requirements specified in Annex A.
* The supplier must submit electronic bids using the epost Connect service or facsimile.

#### Standard Terms and Conditions
The procurement will be governed by the Standard Acquisition Clauses and Conditions Manual, which can be accessed at the Government of Canada's website.

#### Contact Information
Contact Andrew MacFarlane for more information on this RFP:

* Email: [andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (782) 377-4248
* Fax: (506) 851-6759

#### Notice of Tender Closing
The tender closing date was on Thursday, September 15th, 2022 at 13:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). However, this tender announcement has already expired.

### Downloads and Attachments

You can download the RFP document and attachments from the Government of Canada's website:

* RFP Document (English and French): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/31/aa37b9c11e88218
